refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the next sibling of node

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function returns the next sibling of the current node. If there is no next sibling it returns false (< 4.3) or null (&gt= 4.3). You can use this function to iterate over all children of a node as shown in the example.

example.title: Iterate over children
example.programlisting:
<?php
include("example.inc");

if(!$dom = domxml_open_mem($xmlstr)) {
  echo "Error while parsing the document\n";
  exit;
}

$elements = $dom->get_elements_by_tagname("tbody");
$element = $elements[0];
$child = $element->first_child();

while($child) {
   print_r($child);
   $child = $child->next_sibling();
}
?>
